message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
Your offer isn't fair, Alice. Let's split it evenly.
I'll give you a bit more, but I still deserve more
How about this?  It's closer to even, but still recognizes that I get to make this offer.
I'll meet you in the middle of our last offers
Okay, Alice. Let's be reasonable.  I'll take a slight edge since it's my turn to offer, but this is as close to even as we're going to get.
